H0.text: What is the term for the thousands of rocky or icy bodies orbiting the sun between Jupiter and Mars. Asteroid Region

H1.text: What is the term for the thousands of rocky or icy bodies orbiting the sun between Jupiter and Mars. Jupiter-Mars Orbitals

H2.text: What is the term for the thousands of rocky or icy bodies orbiting the sun between Jupiter and Mars. Inner Solar System

H3.text: What is the term for the thousands of rocky or icy bodies orbiting the sun between Jupiter and Mars. Main belt

A4.text: The asteroid belt is also called the main asteroid belt or main belt to distinguish it from other asteroid populations in the Solar System.
